meanings.sent1: She was enswathing the gift in colorful paper.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar was enswathing itself in a cocoon.
meanings.sent3: The magician enswathed the audience in a cloud of mystery.
meanings.sent4: The fog enswathing the city gave it a mystical aura.
meanings.sent5: The warm blanket enswathed her in comfort on the cold night.

meanings.sent1: The spider was enswathing its prey in silk.
meanings.sent2: The darkness enswathing the room made it hard to see.
meanings.sent3: The hug from her friend enswathed her in a feeling of warmth.
meanings.sent4: The vines enswathing the old building gave it a haunted look.
meanings.sent5: The mist enswathed the mountain, creating an ethereal scene.
